page.title: 06DIARY OF A VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Chevington Village Hall Diary Sept.1985 3, 10 Good Companions 2.30-4.30 pm 3, 10, 17, 24 Choir 7.30-9.00 pm 5, Womens Institute 7.30-9.30 pm 6, 13, 20, 27 Junior Club 6.30-8.00 pm 6, Foresters 8.15-10.15pm 9, 10, 12, 13, 16 ) 17, 19, 20, 23, 24) Playgroup 26, 27, 30 ) 9.45-11.45am 12, Church Deanary Meeting 7.30-10.00pm 19, Whist Drive 7.30 pm 23, Junior Club A.G.M. 8.00-9.00 pm 30, Village Hall Committee Meeting 8 pm HIRE CHARGES From 1st July 1985 A. Contract Hire $2.00 per hour B. External Regualr Hire $3.25 per hour C. Casual Hire (single occasion) Afternoon 2.00 - 6.00 pm $8.75 Evenings 8.00 - 12.00pm $18.00 All bookings for Saturday evening will be at the $18.00 rate.
